paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted pathogenic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: 15-year-old female, mixed Belgian, Hungarian, English, and Scottish descent

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The first exome analysis identified a secondary finding of a paternally inherited pathogenic BRCA2 variant.

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as pathogenic but specific functional assays are not detailed.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified during whole-exome sequencing.
key_quotes: The first exome analysis identified a secondary finding of a paternally inherited pathogenic BRCA2 variant.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
